scripts.check: npm run -s test:cardinality && npx tsc --noEmit && npm run -s build
scripts.test:cardinality: rm -rf .tmp-tests && tsc --pretty false --noEmit false --module esnext --moduleResolution bundler --target es2022 --outDir .tmp-tests tests/cardinality.test.ts lib/cardinality.ts types.ts && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node .tmp-tests/tests/cardinality.test.js && rm -rf .tmp-tests
